articles.author: Jamal Burns
articles.title: Next Gen Favorites: the half-finished Duolingo course
articles.description: Lots of people get stalled halfway through a Duolingo course — but instead of feeling bad, we should be rethinking our ideas about education.
articles.content:
Illustration by Ari Liloan for The Verge

articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Welcome to Simulation City, the virtual world where Waymo tests its autonomous vehicles
articles.description: Waymo is using not one but two simulators to test its autonomous vehicles in virtual settings. The newest one is called Simulation City, which helps the Alphabet company better prepare its robotaxis and autonomous trucks for real-world situations.
articles.content: The Alphabet company is doubling up on simulation as it gets closer to commercialization A light gray cube with a thin blue top glides down a darkened highway, beset on all sides by dozens of green c… [+8967 chars]
